overview:
Maria Zhang is Founder and CEO of Propeld Inc, a mobile technology company in Seattle. The Propeld Platform provides brands, retailers, and developers a cloud based solution to enable an enriched and personalized experience for mobile consumers.

Maria has 15 years experience in designing and building large-scale machine learning and data mining systems to bring value to millions of individual consumers. At Microsoft, Maria led the Personal Relevance team for MSN content. At Zillow, she led teams responsible for data integration, warehousing, and mining.
